p: A Cochrane review of five RCTs using Ganoderma lucidum showed that cancer patients (especially lung cancer, colon cancer, breast cancer) in the verum group were more likely to respond positively compared to placebo and chemo/radiotherapy alone (RR 1.50; 95% CI 0.90 to 2.51, p = 0.02) ( Jin et al., 2016). The treatment with Ganoderma lucidum alone did not show the same regression rate as the combined therapy.
